member.name: INameSpaceTreeAccessible.OnDoDefaultAccessibilityAction
member.summary: Invokes the default accessibility action on a Shell item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeAccessible.OnGetAccessibilityRole
member.summary: Gets the accessibility role for a Shell item.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a that specifies the role.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeAccessible.OnGetDefaultAccessibilityAction
member.summary: Gets the default accessibility action for a Shell item.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a BSTR that specifies the default, accessibility action.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or E_OUTOFMEMORY otherwise.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeAccessible
member.summary: Exposes methods that perform accessibility actions on a Shell item from a namespace tree control.
